title: Game freezes when i try to type
body: So I'm able to type very small and quick words but when I try to say anything besides like gg or lol my game will freeze. I'm able to alt+tab and hear stuff going on in the game but when I go back it will freeze again. How do I fix this?

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10?  This could be caused by some third party app getting in the way like overlays or the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Let me know if disabling that helps, but test it in a custom.

Thank you for commenting. I am on Windows 10. I think I disabled the game bar but I not exactly sure. I can type freely in a custom game with myself, but as soon as I get into a normal game I am not able to. it keeps freezing. I run my computer off a phone hotspot but have never had this problem In the past. and I usually get around 50 ping.
I can still play the game just fine with no lag but as soon as I start to type longer than like three letters my game will freeze.

It could be other apps and mods as well like Discord Overlay.  Try a [clean boot](https://support.gaijin.net/hc/en-us/articles/200070041-How-To-Perform-a-Clean-Boot-PC-MAC-) and see if the freezing stops.  If so, slowly start loading up other apps to see if one of them might be the culprit.
